## Part b)

Create a vector that goes from 1 to 100 and calculates the average of it WITHOUT using the R function “mean”.

```{r}
vector <- (1:100)
vector
```

```{r}
s <- sum(vector)
s
```

```{r}
l <- length(vector)
l
```

```{r}
average <- s/l
average
```
